TopicTitle: How do I create a custom science experiment?

Articles.Content: I want to make a custom science experiment with a custom part that I'm making, but I don't know where to start. Anyone know how to start?

I want to make a custom science experiment with a custom part that I'm making, but I don't know where to start. Anyone know how to start?

here and here, I guess. You can also peak on another experiments mod config files to see what he's doing.

Salud.
do note that I also said "and I had reason to use it" - so we might wanna discuss the experiment itself first to see if I'd even bother putting it on a rocket
